content: pdf digital download crochet pattern crochet these rustic and cozy farmhouse-tiered trees for your holiday decor the pattern works up quickly in super bulky weight yarn cinnamon stick base provides a delightful and festive aroma makes a perfect gift or item to sell at markets easily make a whole set in a day video tutorial on youtube included difficulty easy written in standard american terms **lion brand wool-ease thick & quick 80% acrylic 20% wool 106yds/170g ** super bulky weight yarn #6 1 ball all sizes 110 140 160 g us n 9mm or size needed to obtain gauge use code mjs15 for 15% off https //furlscrochet com/products/streamline-resin-crochet-hooks sscid=b1k5_10sx9c& tapestry needle removable stitch marker cinnamon sticks paper towel roll/toilet paper roll glue gun gauge 6 sts and 4 row equal to 2 with 9mm crochet hook in hbsc s m l 11 12 14 a full video tutorial for the tree is available here https //www youtube com/watch v=xlcsymvbews find craft supplies at the dollar store or amazon here https //www amazon com/shop/mjsoffthehookdesigns you re welcome to sell your finished items from this pattern when selling items online i would love you to reference me as the designer you must use your own photos to sell your work all my images are copyright protected and cannot be used to sell your items
